meanings.definition: A job or task done on the side for cash.
meanings.sent1: She picked up a nixer cleaning houses on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He took on a nixer fixing cars in the evenings.
meanings.sent3: The nixer of walking dogs turned into a full-time business.
meanings.sent4: His nixer as a handyman was a hidden talent waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nixer of painting fences brought color to his life.

meanings.definition: To work on the side for cash.
meanings.sent1: They nixer to earn extra money for vacations.
meanings.sent2: She decided to nixer as a tutor after school.
meanings.sent3: He would nixer as a waiter on busy weekends.
meanings.sent4: The idea to nixer as a gardener sprouted in her mind.
meanings.sent5: They nixer diligently to save up for a new car.
